## ListsService.getUsers() method

Gets a list of Users. This operation returns an instance of 'User' type or one of the following inherited types:<ul class="model-list"><li><span>AccessToken</span></li></ul>

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getUsers({ predefined, includeDisabled, search, searchMode, }: {
        predefined?: boolean;
        includeDisabled?: boolean;
        search?: string;
        searchMode?: 'Contains' | 'StartsWith' | 'EndsWith' | 'ExactMatch';
    }): CancelablePromise<Array<User>>;
```
